title: Everything You Need in a Modern Lift Controller
subtitle: Advanced technology that makes boating easier

features.title: Start Before You Arrive
features.description: Lower your lift while entering the channel. Pull right up when you arrive - no waiting.

features.title: Digital Timer System
features.description: No mechanical stops to adjust. Press to set limits - the system remembers automatically.

features.title: Solid State Relays
features.description: Quiet, reliable switching with no moving parts. Built to last in marine environments.

features.title: 3-Wire Installation
features.description: Everything runs through just 3 wires. Simpler than any other smart system.

features.title: Share Access Easily
features.description: Grant temporary access to family, friends, or service techs right from the app.

features.title: Anti-Theft Alerts
features.description: Get instant notifications if your lift moves unexpectedly. Know your boat is secure.
